benchmark_info.description: Ground truth answers for responsive design test cases including modern CSS techniques

Does the layout work well on mobile devi.reasoning: Layout adapts properly with mobile-first responsive design
Does the layout work well on mobile devi.measurable_criteria: Media queries, flexible grid, appropriate touch targets

Are touch targets appropriately sized fo.reasoning: All interactive elements meet 44px minimum touch target size

Is the text readable without horizontal.reasoning: Responsive design prevents horizontal scroll on mobile viewports
Is the text readable without horizontal.measurable_criteria: No fixed widths, proper viewport meta tag, flexible containers

Does the navigation adapt appropriately.reasoning: Navigation stacks vertically on mobile with larger touch targets
Does the navigation adapt appropriately.measurable_criteria: flex-direction: column in mobile media query

Does the grid layout adjust for differen.reasoning: CSS Grid auto-adjusts from 3 columns to 1 column on mobile
Does the grid layout adjust for differen.measurable_criteria: grid-template-columns changes from auto-fit to 1fr on mobile

Does the layout work well on mobile devi.reasoning: Fixed width layout causes horizontal scrolling and poor mobile experience
Does the layout work well on mobile devi.measurable_criteria: Fixed 1200px width, no responsive breakpoints, tiny text

Are touch targets appropriately sized fo.reasoning: Interactive elements are far too small for reliable touch interaction
Are touch targets appropriately sized fo.measurable_criteria: Buttons: 16px height, links: 20px height (both well below 44px minimum)

Is the text readable without horizontal.reasoning: Fixed width container forces horizontal scrolling on mobile
Is the text readable without horizontal.measurable_criteria: width: 1200px fixed container causes viewport overflow

Is the font size appropriate for mobile.reasoning: Font sizes are too small for comfortable mobile reading
Is the font size appropriate for mobile.measurable_criteria: Body text: 12px, button text: 8px (below 16px mobile minimum)

Does the content adapt to smaller screen.reasoning: No responsive design - layout identical across all screen sizes
Does the content adapt to smaller screen.measurable_criteria: No media queries, fixed grid columns, no adaptive behavior

Are interactive elements usable on touch.reasoning: Touch targets too small and closely spaced for accurate tapping

fixes_required: replace fixed width with flexible containers (max-width + %)
add mobile breakpoints with media queries
increase font sizes to 16px minimum on mobile

Does the layout use modern container-bas.reasoning: Uses CSS container queries to adapt components based on container width rather than viewport

Do the card components adapt appropriate.reasoning: Cards change layout and styling based on their container size, not just viewport
Do the card components adapt appropriate.measurable_criteria: Different layouts at container widths 250px, 400px with proper fallbacks

Is there proper fallback support for old.reasoning: Includes @supports feature queries with media query fallbacks

Does the layout handle viewport units co.reasoning: Uses 100vh which causes issues on mobile Safari due to dynamic address bar
Does the layout handle viewport units co.measurable_criteria: 100vh creates content cutoff, vw units cause horizontal scrolling

Is the typography scaling appropriate ac.reasoning: Text sized with viewport units becomes unreadable on some screens
Is the typography scaling appropriate ac.measurable_criteria: vw-based font sizing without min/max constraints

Would the layout work reliably across di.reasoning: Viewport unit issues are particularly problematic on mobile browsers
Would the layout work reliably across di.measurable_criteria: No consideration for browser UI changes, dynamic viewports

fixes_required: replace 100vh with min-height and JavaScript viewport calculation
use clamp() for text sizing with viewport units
implement proper mobile viewport height handling
add min/max constraints for viewport-based sizing

Does the typography scale smoothly and a.reasoning: Uses CSS clamp() functions for perfect fluid typography with min/max constraints
Does the typography scale smoothly and a.measurable_criteria: clamp() functions provide smooth scaling with readable limits

Are viewport height issues handled prope.reasoning: Includes JavaScript solution for mobile viewport height with CSS custom properties
Are viewport height issues handled prope.measurable_criteria: JavaScript updates --vh custom property, safer viewport calculations

Is the text hierarchy maintained across.reasoning: Proportional scaling maintains visual hierarchy at all viewport sizes
Is the text hierarchy maintained across.measurable_criteria: Consistent size relationships between headings and body text

Does the spacing system scale proportion.reasoning: Uses fluid spacing variables that scale harmoniously with text
Does the spacing system scale proportion.measurable_criteria: CSS custom properties for consistent fluid spacing system
